title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 19 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 19 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush from Seattle on Wednesday. Forget the Green New Deal, Fauxcahontas has a Blue New Deal. Sanders didn’t earn a paycheck until he was 40. Even donors want Biden out of the race. Why are illegals above U.S. law and you aren’t? Government healthcare not giving vets the help they need. Bloomberg or Warren should read Sanders’ rape poetry. Is it time to panic if Hillary runs with Mini Mike? Bloomberg’s hypocrisy. Pajama Boy was born out of Obama.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Your most important possession is your conscience. Farmers will jump away from Bloomberg. Obama trying to take credit for Trump’s economy is laughable. There is a movement to abolish police. Cops are being treated like Vietnam veterans returning home. Police have to deal with the policies made by politicians. The Left Coast experiments are encouraging violence. The vortex of the left. Bloomberg’s farmers comments are prototypical of the Democrats.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump going to California is a fight against Dem-dominated areas. Everyone feels good about the Trump economy. Which Dem is actually less arrogant than Mini Mike? Bloomberg doesn’t understand the complexity of farming. Whataboutisms show if you are honest. The transformation of the open borders agenda. Media lies about enforcing immigration laws.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
